definitions.definition: An imaginary flower that does not wither .
Any of various herbs of the genus Amaranthus .
The characteristic purplish - red colour of the flowers or leaves of these plants.
A red to purple azo dye used as a biological stain , and in some countries in cosmetics and as a food colouring . See Amaranth (dye) .
The seed of these plants, used as a cereal .

main_definition: ( dated , poetic ) An imaginary flower that does not wither .
secondary_definitions: Any of various herbs of the genus Amaranthus .
The characteristic purplish - red colour of the flowers or leaves of these plants.
( organic chemistry ) A red to purple azo dye used as a biological stain , and in some countries in cosmetics and as a food colouring . See Amaranth (dye) .
( cooking ) The seed of these plants, used as a cereal .
